Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Customer

  • public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    Rents videos from AVS Database, pays AVS fees, interacts with AVS Staff, interacts with AVS Managers.
    Author:
    Harold Hansen - Group 4
